hero.core_tension: Trade short-term sitewide cuts for concentrated co-branded early windows. Show the decision tension between pulling buys forward and holding blended margin as a narrow timing choice.
hero.setting: Hybrid studio-store corner. Low 3/4 angle. Long raw-wood table, concrete floor, matte merch displays. Clean negative space to the right for copy or overlay.
hero.persona: Brand Partnerships lead and Store Ops manager, standing close, heads-down over physical mockups.
hero.action: One points at a stack of exclusive bundle boxes while the other peels a QR hang-tag. Exchange of a taped plan labeled 'S1'.
hero.urgency_symbol: A taut red thread looping through stacked boxes, suggesting a limited window without showing a clock.
props: QR redemption hang-tags with visible target ≥5%
Labeled plan sheet: 'Early-window capture vs sitewide discount'
hero.lighting: Polished editorial. Confident highlights on faces and product edges. Soft fill to keep negative space clean.
hero.alt: Brand partnerships lead and store ops align on co-branded early-window bundles.

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings with an inner wedge. Outer ring = sitewide discount; inner wedge = early-window share.
signal_map.motion: Animated pulse flowing from outer ring toward the inner wedge, showing buyer migration and concentrated volume.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals, steel gray, one accent cobalt for partner window, subtle metallic for QR nodes.
signal_map.alt: Abstract map shifting buyer activity from sitewide ring to early-window wedge; shows QR and CPA signals.

case_studies.scene: Store activation corner. Overhead 45-degree angle. Pop-up demo table by the entrance. Materials: woven textiles, brass fittings, branded acrylic.
case_studies.moment: Weekend collab starts to fill. Staff tap QR signs and hand exclusive bundles to customers. A local marketing lead times a demo set labelled 'S2'.
case_studies.persona: Store Ops manager and local Marketing lead running three weekend activations (S2).
props: Weekend activation banner labeled 'S2 — test 6 weeks'
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial with warm spotlights on demo table and clean shadow falloff.
case_studies.alt: Store ops and marketing run weekend collab activation; staff log QR redemptions.

case_studies.scene: Pricing war room. Eye-level, tight crop on hands and printed price cards. Material: matte paper, glass whiteboard with magnets.
case_studies.moment: Merch and Pricing swap a sitewide 20% off card for tiered collab bundles. Team pins A/B boards labeled 'Control: sitewide' and 'Variant: S3 tiered bundles'.
case_studies.persona: Merch lead and Pricing analyst running a 6-week A/B test to keep blended margin neutral (S3).
props: Tiered bundle mockups with SKU labels
A/B test boards and blended margin calculator
Sheet titled 'Early-window capture vs sitewide discount'
case_studies.lighting: Cool, crisp editorial. High contrast on cards to emphasize numbers.
case_studies.alt: Merch and pricing swap sitewide discount for tiered collab bundles, preparing A/B test.

case_studies.scene: Store-as-studio shoot. 45-degree camera angle. Textured backdrop, aisle as shallow set, materials: matte product boxes, camera metal rig.
case_studies.moment: Producer cues a micro-influencer for a quick cut. Crew pins sticky notes: 'S4 ep1' and 'S5 high-news-day offer'.
case_studies.persona: Marketing producer with micro-influencer executing a 4-episode store-as-studio series (S4) and planning high-news-day offers (S5).
props: Co-branded bundles staged for hero shots
Notepad labeled 'S5: concentrate offers on high-news days'
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial with strong rim highlights and clean negative space for compositing.
case_studies.alt: Marketing runs store-as-studio shoot with micro-influencers to lift early-window share.
